original_text:
You who are the hope of Israel,
    its Savior in times of distress,
why are you like a stranger in the land,
    like a traveler who stays only a night?
korean_text: 이스라엘의 소망이시요 고난 당한 때의 구원자시여 어찌하여 이 땅에서 거류하는 자 같이, 하룻밤을 유숙하는 나그네 같이 하시나이까

sentences.original_text: You who are the hope of Israel
its Savior in times of distress
why are you like a stranger in the land
like a traveler who stays only a night
